summary: Grit Bounty - A task bounty platform on Internet Computer where users can post challenges/tasks with ICP rewards, and 'warriors' can accept and complete them for bounties. Currently building the introduction page to explain the platform concept.
architectural_notes: Grit Bounty platform concept: Task bounty system where users post challenges with ICP stakes, warriors accept tasks with collateral deposits, and platform handles automated settlement with 6% fee
Warrior credit system: Initial 50% deposit requirement, reduces 3% per successful task completion down to minimum 2% (after 16 completions), resets to 50% on failure
